entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
